example.eg: The inspector checked out the suspect's alibi by questioning his friends.
example.egtrans: 通过质询嫌疑人的朋友，调查员查证了嫌疑人的不在场证明。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 查证, 核实, 查实

example.eg: When you're in New York, be sure to check out that camera store I told you about.
example.egtrans: 到了纽约，一定要去看看我跟你说过的那家相机店。

example.eg: Check out that guy in the top hat!
example.egtrans: 查看那个戴高顶礼帽的人！

example.eg: I checked out two books from the library last week and I've lost one of them.
example.egtrans: 我上周在图书馆借了两本书，但其中一本丢了。

example.eg: At this hotel, you must check out by 11:00 am or pay for another day.
example.egtrans: 在这家酒店，你必须在上午11点前退房，否则就得另付一天的房费。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结账后离开，办理退房手续

example.egtrans: 他的不在场证明得到了证实。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 得到核实, 得到证实

example.eg: There were rumors that the crime boss had checked out some time ago.
example.egtrans: 有谣言称，那位犯了罪的老板已在不久前去世了。

example.eg: I think I left my wallet at the checkout.
example.egtrans: 我好像把钱包落在收银台了。

example.eg: Go to checkout and enter your credit card information.
example.egtrans: 转去结账页面，输入您的信用卡信息。

example.eg: Be sure to examine your bill carefully on checkout.
example.egtrans: 结账退房时，一定要仔细查看账单。
退房手续在上午11点办理。

example.eg: Check-out time on the departure day is until 12:00 am.
example.egtrans: 出发当天，最晚的退房时间是中午12点。

example.eg: Check it out, man! That car's just too cool.
example.egtrans: 快看！那辆车简直太酷了。
